head.title: School District of Somerset | Developing Learners Empowering Futures Together | Somerset, WI 54025

div.p:
Please visit this page for the most current information related to COVID-19, school closure, and resources available to families. Need further assistance? Contact your child's teachers or principal via email. Email addresses can be found on the resources page.Â
Read More >
